My Work

Personal and Group Projects:

Overridden Films

  • Video Background manipulation on landing page using react-video.
  • Entire App styled in SASS/CSS and contains Parallax effect on About page.
  • Secure login via Auth0
  • PostgreSQL used as database for keeping track of business merchandise and user information.
  • Redux used to keep track of number of items in Cart.
  • Can securely make payment using Stripe.

A clone of Override Films website, overridefilms.com, with added e-commerce functionality while maintaining small business aesthetic. Includes user login, shop, cart, stripe checkout, and notification email based on email used in login in addition to stylistic themes featured in original such as Parallax and consistency in primary and secondary colors used with SASS.

Live Project Github

Checked

  • Can register via Bcrypt for securely salted and hashed password protection.
  • Profile page allows users to change profile icon to Knight, King, Queen, Rook, or Bishop.
  • PostgreSQL used as database for storing user information and game history.
  • Can challenge online opponents in Arena view on profile and both will be programmatically redirected to gameboard
  • Socket.io was used for multiplayer interactivity over the board, updating movelist, and to allow users to chat with one another in real-time.
  • Users will be redirected to profile page upon checkmate.
  • Entire app was styled using SASS, and About page includes flip container transformations on co-developers who created the site.

A multiplayer chess application built for chess enthusiasts and those interested in playing real-time chess. Uses socket.io for multiplayer interactivity and chat features between opponents, uses massive, express, and postgreSQL, for keep tracking of users, game history, and general user info such as wins/losses, rating, and the highest rated players on the site.

Live Project Github
